name: 跳跃音符
description:
Simple, exciting and challenging games, let's go to the horse with our hands.

Game features:

1. simple game picture, everyone is a pianist!

2. constantly challenge your eye speed and speed limit!

3. massive classical songs are constantly updated, waiting for your continuous unlocking.

4. versus global players in the rankings!

Rules of play:

Don't step on the dangerous area! Follow the rhythm to click the security button and concentrate on Let 's go!
publishers: Beijing Bochuang wuxian Culture media co
